metadata.title: Polish Pottery Mug - 16 oz. Bistro - Autumn
features: Use for coffee, tea, hot chocolate, cider and more! This mug is a perfect gift for any occasion- birthdays, anniversaries, secret santas, get well soons, weddings, etc.!
All of our Polish Pottery is safe for use in the microwave, dishwasher, and oven
